Dialog.&8&lMoriarty: I am a bit busy. Who are you?
Dialog.[PLAYER]: Who i am does not matter.
I am here to take back what you took from Blake!
Dialog.&8&lMoriarty: I see... Blake didn't have the courage to come himself huh?
This will be even easier than I thought!
Alright little guy, on the rooftop of this building are three helpers of mine.
They have been instructed to throw those precious ingredients into lava.
The only way you can save the ingredients is by catching them before they fall.
Oh... they might also have a... booming surprise.
But I am sure that won't be an issue, right?
Dialog.[PLAYER]: I am going to beat you!

RandomDialog.&8&lMoriarty: Phahahaha, you want to try again?
Sure... Good luck!
&lNOT!
Blake sent his little helper to try again, how cute.
Let's see if those little arms can do better this time.
Why are you even helping that excuse of a cook?
I will never understand the trainer species
Anyways, I am sure my boys wont mind throwing some more stuff in lava!
I would give you some sweets for effort,
but they all burned up!
No chance you can save what is left.
Does your mommy even know you are here?
I would call her if i were you!
You have to report great failures to your parents!
I am getting tired.
Nothing is stopping me from throwing them all down at once!
But I will give you one more chance.
I am such a nice guy!
Blake needs a real cake up call
A little helper like you isn't going to cut it.
Don't forget to drop as many as you can!
Blake wants a piece of me,
but I am pretty sure I have a piece of his cake!

Dialog.&8&lMoriarty: Seems like you aren't that bad at catching stuff huh?
I now know who you are,
